content.question: Which of the following statements best describes how the moths adapted to the new environment over time?

choices.label: The moths adapted to the new environment through isolation.
The moths adapted to the new environment through primary succession.
The moths adapted to the new environment by changes in the genetics of the population.
The moths adapted to the new environment by becoming a generalist species.

content.answer: The moths adapted to the new environment by changes in the genetics of the population.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain environmental concepts, processes, or models in applied contexts.
